name: phoonnx
description: Blazingly fast phoneme-to-text and text-to-phoneme conversion using ONNX models. Cross-platform inference engine for phonetic processing.

name: ALIGN
description: Advanced forced alignment toolkit for speech and text. Precise timestamp generation for audio-transcript synchronization.

name: ovoscope
description: Open Voice Operating System core framework. Privacy-focused, modular voice assistant platform for building custom AI assistants.

name: Open Voice OS
description: Community-driven, open-source voice AI platform for creating custom voice-controlled interfaces across devices with NLP, customizable UI, and a focus on privacy and security.

name: HiveMind
description: Flexible protocol for communication and collaboration among devices and AI agents. Enables lightweight satellites to connect to central hubs with customizable permissions and hierarchical networking.
